attributes.action: bring Never Never land  gardens Southend on sea
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of my petition is to get the department for local communities and government allow Southend council to  bring back Never Never land to bring back the illumation fairy lights garden with its fairy story models to new generation children it could be design in with following
Children and could go round the gardens interactive head phones
Amotronic trees animated faces
Water fountains over top of you
Peter pan and  captain hook sculptures
Crocodile from peter pan amotronic
Tinkerbell laser light show
Interactive light up toad stools
Lost boy tree house
Interactive garden with touch soundscapes
Mermaid water pool and island model fountain
